 Formula-building rule for universal quantifier (deduction rule). (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
albidh.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
albidh.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
albidh $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x ps <-> A. x ch ) ) $.
